fields.summary: Security groups can't be deleted while still in use by an instance, but AWS EC2 Compatible message not returned

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
When deleting a group that is currently in use (ive seen it most in automated
runs that dont wait long enough for a terminate) the following error is
presented. We should add something that points the user to the fact that the
group is still being used somewhere:

    
    
    euca-delete-group ec2opsgroup863  
    
    Warning: Permanently added '192.168.51.85' (RSA) to the list of known hosts.
    DeleteSecurityGroupType: Failed to delete security group: ec2opsgroup863 for arn:aws:euare::171316380579:user/admin because of: org.hibernate.exception.ConstraintViolationException: could not delete: [com.eucalyptus.network.ExtantNetwork#4028b3d533fc09620133fc15803f015a]
    Caused by: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.MySQLIntegrityConstraintViolationException: Cannot delete or update a parent row: a foreign key constraint fails (`eucalyptus_cloud`.`metadata_network_indices`, CONSTRAINT `FKBDC151865DAB4005` FOREIGN KEY (`metadata_network_index_extant_network_fk`) REFERENCES `metadata_extant_network` (`id`))
fields.summary: Better Message on deletion of security group still in use

Originally posted on 2012-01-18 21:47:54
Won't fix in 3.0. Known issue.

Originally posted on 2012-01-18 21:47:55

<URL: https://support.eucalyptus.com/Ticket/Display.html?id=4909 >

Won't fix in 3.0. Known issue.

Originally posted on 2012-01-18 21:47:55
Won't fix in 3.0. Known issue.

Deletion that fails due to group in use now results in an error response
with status code 400 and the following code / message:

  InvalidGroup.InUse
  Specified group cannot be deleted because it is in use.

Lookup for groups using invalid name or group identifier now result in
error responses using the code / message:

  InvalidGroup.NotFound
  The security group 'XXX' does not exist

where XXX is the group name or identifier.

To reproduce the error for a group in use run an instance in a security group and then delete that group.
When verifying please ensure that the fix addresses the duplicate issues EUCA-2655 and EUCA-5840 (though note that conflicting messages were suggested for the "InvalidGroup.InUse" error code)
Can we see the commit? The commit tab is empty. Is it available in testing?

The commit will be added automatically, though it takes a few minutes. I'll add here also since there is interest:

https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucalyptus/commit/5a62113255dbad127be1f1931b9cfcf4ee26b634

Fix Verified

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 3.4.0
Release     : 0.0.1432.20130827gitb2b8c5ac.el6

{code}
euca-delete-group: error (InvalidGroup.InUse): Specified group cannot be deleted because it is in use.
{code}
